mapper.select: select r.*,u.name,o.goods_name from request_goods r inner join users u on r.user_id = u.id inner join office_supplies o on r.goods_id = o.id limit #{startPage},#{rows}
select r.*,u.name,o.goods_name from request_goods r inner join users u on r.user_id = u.id inner join office_supplies o on r.goods_id = o.id where u.id=#{userId} limit #{startPage},#{rows}
mapper.update: update request_goods set state='已审批',approver_date=#{date},approver=#{approverName} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select r.*,u.name,o.goods_name from request_goods r inner join users u on r.user_id = u.id inner join office_supplies o on r.goods_id = o.id where u.name like '%${value}%'
select o.id as g_id from request_goods r inner join office_supplies o on o.id=r.goods_id where r.id=#{value}
